I need to modify a molecular structure by removing a nitrile group and adding a thiol group to a specified molecule.

Looking at the input SMILES string `C[NH+]1CCC(Nc2ccc3cc(C#N)ccc3n2)CC1`:
1. The molecule contains a nitrile group (C#N) that needs to be removed
2. I need to replace it with a thiol group (SH)

The nitrile group is located in the fused ring system at position `cc(C#N)ccc3n2`. I'll replace the C#N with a thiol (SH):

```
{
    "output": "C[NH+]1CCC(Nc2ccc3cc(S)ccc3n2)CC1"
}
```
